content:
Here's my next response:

Those are some great tips, thank you! I think the hanger trick is a really smart way to figure out what I haven't worn in a while. And I do have a lot of clothes that are out of season, so storing them in bins or containers is a good idea. I've been meaning to get some stackable shelves for my closet too, so that's a good reminder. By the way, speaking of reminders, I need to remember to ask my sister about my bright yellow sundress that I lent her for her birthday party last weekend. I hope she didn't spill anything on it...
